_header: That thee then [þeo] should be a virgin pure
_description: Praise of the Virgin Mary, in a Latin sermon — three couplets and one monorhyming triplet

CamJes13.First Lines:
Þat þe þeo schulde be a uirgine pureÞat heo was
                    take to cristes cure…
CamJes13.Last Lines: …leuedi of þis werld heysAnd of helle emperis
